metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41803 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: HashiCorp Consul 1.8.1 up to 1.11.8, 1.12.4, and 1.13.1 do not properlyvalidate the node or segment names prior to interpolation and usage in JWTclaim assertions with the auto config RPC. Fixed in 1.11.9, 1.12.5, and1.13.2."

criterions.comment: consul: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
